content: Dear BitCoinTalk Community, We're excited to announce the ColdFi Tech, a new DeFi platform that integrates cross-chain swaps, lending, and order books over DEX liquidity. We will initially launch on Callisto Network(proof of concept) and Binance Smart Chain. ColdFi's key feature is automatic finding of the best trading path on all DEX Swaps(Uniswap compatible at launch) and executing it cross chain using Liquidity Bridge. This makes it easy for users to execute trades quickly and efficiently, with high levels of security. Another features:-"CEX" style trading interface with trading charts, order books, perpetual and margin trading. All this using existing DEX liquidity- Instant(1 transaction on source and destination chain) cross chain swaps/trading. - Ability to earn by providing liquidity without Impermanent losses. - CFT token for government with limited supply, staking. Tokenomic focused on token burn.We start public seed sale on 1st May, short info:200M CFT will be minted. No additional mint will be possible. 120M CFT will be available on public seed sale with price $0.02The team tokens will be unlocked over a period of two years, with a constant rate of release per block.You can find more info in our Whitepaper: https://coldfi.gitbook.io/whitepaperJoin our Telegram group at https://t.me/ColdFiTechTwitter: https://twitter.com/ColdFiTechOr our site https://coldfi.techThank you for your support and we will appreciate your feedback here or in our groupsBest regards,The ColdFi Team

comments.author: Dzik
comments.body: Few words about our Liquidity BridgeWhen it comes to providing liquidity on decentralized exchanges (DEXs), there are some challenges that liquidity providers (LPs) face. One of the most common challenges is the issue of impermanent loss. Impermanent loss occurs when the price of the tokens in a liquidity pool changes, and as a result, the LPs lose some of the value of their holdings.However, with the advent of the liquidity bridge technology, LPs can now provide liquidity without worrying about impermanent loss. This is because the liquidity bridge allows LPs to deposit tokens on different chains, which are then used by trading contracts for cross-chain swaps.By using the liquidity bridge, LPs can earn a portion of the trading fees generated by these swaps. Additionally, their funds are secured by the same tokens on other chains, which reduces the risk of losing their investment.In comparison, providing liquidity on popular DEXs requires LPs to deposit tokens into a liquidity pool, which creates a pair of tokens. This means that LPs are exposed to the risk of impermanent loss if the price of the tokens in the pool changes.Overall, the liquidity bridge technology offers LPs a way to provide liquidity with reduced risk and without worrying about impermanent loss. It opens up new opportunities for LPs to earn income and participate in the decentralized finance (DeFi) ecosystem.
